content:
RibbonControlSizeDefinition Class

In this Article

Specifies information about the size and visibility of the images and label associated with a Ribbon control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class RibbonControlSizeDefinition : System.Windows.Freezable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • DispatcherObject
  • DependencyObject
  • System.Windows.Freezable
  • RibbonControlSizeDefinition

Remarks

For more information, see Ribbon Layout and Resizing.

Properties summary

ImageSize

Gets or sets a value that indicates how to show the image on a control.
IsCollapsed

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is collapsed.
IsLabelVisible

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control’s label is visible.
MaxWidth

Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
MinWidth

Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
Width

Gets or sets the width of a container control in a Ribbon.

Properties

  • ImageSize

    Gets or sets a value that indicates how to show the image on a control.

    public System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize ImageSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RibbonImageSize

      One of the enumeration values that specify how to show the image on a control. The registered default is RibbonImageSize. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

    Remarks

    A Ribbon control can display a RibbonImageSize image, a RibbonImageSize image, or the image can be RibbonImageSize. If the control does not specify an image of the size that corresponds to the ImageSize setting, no image is displayed.

    Dependency Property Information
    Identifier field ImageSizeProperty
    Metadata properties set to true None
  • IsCollapsed

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is collapsed.

    public bool IsCollapsed { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if a control is collapsed; otherwise, false.

  • IsLabelVisible

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control’s label is visible.

    public bool IsLabelVisible { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the control’s label is visible; otherwise, false. The registered default is true. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

    Remarks

    If the label property of the control is not set, no label will be shown even if the IsLabelVisible property is true.

    Dependency Property Information
    Identifier field IsLabelVisibleProperty
    Metadata properties set to true None
  • MaxWidth

    Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.

    public System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength MaxWidth { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RibbonControlLength

      The maximum width of the control. The registered default is PositiveInfinity. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

    Remarks

    This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.

    Dependency Property Information
    Identifier field MaxWidthProperty
    Metadata properties set to true None
  • MinWidth

    Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.

    public System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength MinWidth { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RibbonControlLength

      The minimum width of the control. The registered default is 0. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

    Remarks

    This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.

    Dependency Property Information
    Identifier field MinWidthProperty
    Metadata properties set to true None
  • Width

    Gets or sets the width of a container control in a Ribbon.

    public System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength Width { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RibbonControlLength

      The width of the control. The registered default is stem.Windows.GridLength.Auto*. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

    Remarks

    This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.

    Dependency Property Information
    Identifier field WidthProperty
    Metadata properties set to true None
